- [Home Page](http://localhost:8080/) Mock web server
- [Meta Page](http://localhost:8080/meta) Meta Test
- /into
  - /into/the
    - [Deep Page](http://localhost:8080/into/the/deep)
- [Section](http://localhost:8080/section?var=val) Section
  - [Section : Page](http://localhost:8080/section/page) Page
- [Validation Fail](http://localhost:8080/validate-fail)
- [/text](http://localhost:8080/text)
- [Validation Warn](http://localhost:8080/validate-warn)
- [Validation Error](http://localhost:8080/validate-error)
